plugin.name: AlternativePlayCount
plugin.title: Alternative Play Count
plugin.desc: Provides alternative play counts and skip counts that aim to reflect your true listening history. You set a time after which a song counts as played. Create (scheduled) backups, restore from backups. Intended as a companion plugin for 'Dynamic Playlists 3' and 'Visual Statistics'. More information on the github page.
plugin.creator: AF
